quote: It does not matter what you bear, but how you bear it.
author: Seneca

quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: You have power over your mind, not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The only way to deal with this life meaningfully is to find one's passion and pursue it.
author: Epictetus

quote: No man is free who is not master of himself.
author: Epictetus

quote: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.
author: Seneca

quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
author: Viktor Frankl

quote: Reliability should be a cornerstone of professional conduct.
author: Joel Mondesir

quote: There is a difference between knowing the path, and walking the path.
author: Morpheus

quote: The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth he acquires, but in his integrity and his ability to affect those around him positively.
author: Bob Marley
